name: Wood Block Puzzle
summary:
Wood Block is a classic and addictive block game!
More crush blocks,more score. Easy to play, but difficult to master.
Completely free and not need Wifi. Once you start, you will be more like this wood block game.


How to play wood block puzzle？
* Drag wood block to fill up the grids
* Blocks can't be rotated.
* There is no mobile block end of the game

Why choose this wood block puzzle?
* Beautiful Wooden style scene
* Fun and classic brick game
* Funny and colorful graphic
* Free game and not need Wifi
* Support leaderboard
* Free retro block puzzle for all age

Now try to enjoy this Wood Block Puzzle Game!
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle
